"When the screen is off, WLAN and mobile data will be temporarily disabled and most applications will be inactive. You will still receive phone calls, SMS/MMS messages and Sony™ calendar notifications and Sony™ alarm signals. The music player and FM radio will work, and downloads and uploads in progress will be allowed to finish.
When the screen is on, your phone will function normally. "
